entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad fix for param-nullchecking involving #if directive #59227
  • Null-checking nullable param warning should be relaxed #59226
  • Adjust generic null-checking codegen for clarity #59223
    17.2
  • Syntactic-sugar indexers with Index and Range don't use implicit conversion, but range operator does? #59222
  • Repo Survey (2022 Edition) #59221
    17.2
  • ServiceHub fails to share CompilationTracker instances or otherwise synchronize dependent project parsing #59218
    17.2
  • AD0001 (analyzer threw exception) diagnostics don't appear in error list #59214
    17.2

Closed

  • <autogenerated>causes nullable variable to be incorrectly reported as "is not null" #59173
  • Postconditions on user-defined conversion parameters are not respected #49575
    Compiler.Next
  • Annotations do not work for user defined conversion operators #32671
    Compiler.Next
  • Missing "CS8656: Call to non-readonly member from a 'readonly' member results in an implicit copy of 'this'" warning on inner field method calls #36794
    Compiler.Next
  • [LSP] Go to Definition doesn't support source link (or decompilation) #58702
    Backlog
  • XML Documents for Positional Records #52663
    17.2
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes for certain solution after setting net6.0 instead of net5.0 #59190
  • Test plan for "raw string literals" #55306
    17.2
  • Use argument types to guide Signature Help #6713
    Backlog
  • FixAllProvider doesn't support more than two fixes with some identical insertions #59130
    Backlog
  • VS2019 and VS2022 Roslyn / SDK incompatible #59156
  • Capture source generator statistics #59176
  • Compiler should optimize conversion from bool? to bool when code tests for true #39409
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for StringSyntaxAttribute with json/regex/datetime literals. #59225
    Area-IDE
  • Handle param null check with else clause #59224
    Area-IDE
  • Enable keyword highlighting in LSP #59215
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Removes Bing search link from diagnostic data #59212
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Break out navigate-to specific index components into a separate index. #59206
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle nullable annotations on user defined operators and conversions #59169
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move workspace file removal to BG to avoid UI delay #59211
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update publish data for 17.1 #59153
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow full source from metadata and decompilation in LSP #59217
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions (#58730)" (#59148)" #59220
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't require services from the VS layer that aren't present on VS Mac #59210
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add refactoring to convert normal (or verbatim) strings to raw strings. #59180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use SyntaxWalker to visit an arbitrary syntax tree in order to avoid a stack overflow. #59203
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE, Next
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 3rd party usages that came in from json parsing. #59188
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.1-beta1.22081.4 #59181
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge features/RawStringLiterals to main #59182
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Update analyzer-suggestion.md #59213
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Address a few param-nullchecking feedback items #59200
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • QuickInfo and Completion options follow-up #59170
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1586394 #59216
    auto-merge
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringsLiterals #59204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Features/rename_UI_rework Merge Main #59201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Move FunctionIdOptions to EditorFeatures #59166
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
